sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo ( sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #sysIp# , #sysPort# , #sysNm# , #mntrngSttus# , #logInfo# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo SET sys_ip = #sysIp# , sys_port = #sysPort# , sys_nm = #sysNm# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , log_info = #logInfo# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , log_id = #logId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.SYS_IP , A.SYS_PORT , A.SYS_NM , A.MNTRNG_STTUS , A.LOG_INFO , A.CREAT_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LOG_ID FROM ( SELECT SYS_IP , SYS_PORT , SYS_NM , MNTRNG_STTUS , LOG_INFO , CREAT_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LOG_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
SYS_IP = #searchKeyword#
SYS_PORT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SYS_IP DESC , SYS_PORT DESC , LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
SYS_IP = #searchKeyword#
SYS_PORT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
